head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FUTTERMAN, HOWARD S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FUTTERMAN, HOWARD S.

block.p: FUTTERMAN-Howard S. On September 11, 2000, of Westbury, NY. Beloved husband of Charlotte. Devoted father of Ellen and Jeff, Gary and Karen. Dear brother of Robert. Cherished grandfather of Samantha and Jackson. Services on Thursday, 11:30 A.M., at Old Westbury Hebrew Congregation, 21 Old Westbury Road, Old Westbury, L.I. Interment in Wellwood Cemetery, Pinelawn, Long Island.
